title.narrative: Nepal: Enhanced Vocational Education and Training

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to expand the supply of skilled and employable labor by increasing access to quality training programs, and by strengthening the technical and vocational education and training system in Nepal.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A2 (a)-(c) | Description :Establish by 09/30/2011 and thereafter maintain (i)Coordination Committee, (ii) Project ImplementationCommittee, (iii) Technical Advisory Committee, and (iv) Project Secretariat |Due Date :30-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A2 (d) | Description :Ensure that, except in case of unsatisfactory performance, or asrequired by theRecipient's laws, the key staff shall not be transferred before Project completion | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B 1 & 2 | Description :Adopt a Project Implementation Manual, satisfactory in form andsubstance to IDA and carry out the project in accordance to the PIM | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, A1 | Description :Monitor and evaluate the progress of the Project and prepare ProjectReports covering one calendar trimester and including physicaland financial progress | Frequency :Quarterly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, A3 | Description :Submit no later than 6 months after the end of the fiscal yearacceptable audited financial statements | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Number of youth certified for recognition of prior learning(RPL) by NSTB
tracer studies/employer/beneficiary surveys/ and evaluations conducted

baseline.value: Expression of interest for development of information management system from interested firms initiated

actual.value: Modules related to Examination and Affiliation functional

title.narrative: Establishment of an online system for affiliation of training providers

baseline.value: Expression of interest for development of information management system from interested firms initiated

actual.value: The system is now nearly functional. It will become fully functional by October30, 2016.

title.narrative: Effective management by a professionally staffed Secretariat
Establishment of a Training Management Information System

baseline.value: expression of interest for development of information management system from interested firms initiated

actual.value: The system is now partly functional. It will become fully functional by June 2016.
